snippet: The Jets ruled out cornerback Darrin Walls for Sunday’s game against the Kansas City Chiefs, and they signed Simms from the practice squad.
abstract: New York Jets sign quarterback Matt Simms from the practice squad to serve as insurance behind Michael Vick in case backup quarterback Geno Smith is unavailable due to injury.
lead_paragraph: The Jets ruled out cornerback Darrin Walls for Sunday’s game against the Kansas City Chiefs, and they signed Simms from the practice squad.

headline.main: Jets Sign Quarterback Matt Simms From Practice Squad
